description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to purposefully experiment, scale and/or efficiently mainstream high-impact innovations in UNICEF supported programmes, which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed, evaluated and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to purposefully experiment, scale and/or efficiently mainstream high-impact innovations in UNICEF supported programmes

description.narrative: Innovation products and initiatives – ranging from design thinking, internet of good things, drones, renewable energy to youth social entrepreneurship – were designed, piloted or scaled-up to address bottlenecks and support fast-tracking results and improve efficiencies across the three pillars in emergency and development contexts. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of scaled innovations that have been incorporated into standard UNICEF Programming
